title: Weren't we suppposed to get VO's for the shop keepers on SR?
body: Like what we got on ARAM. I swear when the current SR map as released we were told that some would be coming soon. Any word on that?

replies.body: They'll come out with the SR skins they promised.

When?
This is the first time I've heard of that.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dRMpx4mZ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-23T22:17:13.485+0000)
>
> When?
> This is the first time I've heard of that.

It was a few years ago when this version of SR was released they mention wanting to do it
Personally I've never heard anything regarding SR shopkeep VU's, but I definitely think it would be neat. Where did you see Riot talking about it?
Yeah man, i totally wanted it :(

I think they are avoiding it because champs are now being made to have their own voices for purchasing items and such, which would conflict with the shopkeeper's lines. that's one hypothesis at least, even if ARAM does have it.
Please don't give them VO. I play ARAM a lot and hate when they speak
